headline.main: Washington Tribe Joins Legal Challenge Over Modified Salmon
headline.print_headline: Washington Tribe Joins Legal Challenge Over Modified Salmon

docs.snippet: A Native American tribe in Washington state has joined a lawsuit challenging the federal government's approval of an Atlantic salmon genetically modified to grow faster....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Native American tribe in Washington state has joined a lawsuit challenging the federal government's approval of an Atlantic salmon genetically modified to grow faster.

headline.main: Kansas Officer Killed While Looking for Drive-By Suspect
headline.print_headline: Kansas Officer Killed While Looking for Drive-By Suspect

docs.snippet: A Kansas City, Kansas, police officer was shot and killed on Tuesday while searching for a suspect in a drive-by shooting, police said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Kansas City, Kansas, police officer was shot and killed on Tuesday while searching for a suspect in a drive-by shooting, police said.

docs.snippet: For some Republicans, the rise of Donald Trump to the head of their party has been acutely painful. We asked them to share their anguish....

byline.original: By ERICA BERENSTEIN and ALEX BURNS

docs.lead_paragraph: For some Republicans, the rise of Donald Trump to the head of their party has been acutely painful. We asked them to share their anguish.

headline.main: Nice, Riviera Jewel, Has Flip Side as Jihadi Breeding Ground
headline.print_headline: Nice, Riviera Jewel, Has Flip Side as Jihadi Breeding Ground

docs.snippet: Nice, the city that sits on the Bay of Angels and that for many epitomizes the sun-splashed French Riviera, has a flip side unknown to tourists and invisible to most residents, as a breeding ground for Islamic radicals and jihadis....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nice, the city that sits on the Bay of Angels and that for many epitomizes the sun-splashed French Riviera, has a flip side unknown to tourists and invisible to most residents, as a breeding ground for Islamic radicals and jihadis.

headline.main: Hall of Fame Iron Man Favre Almost Flunked Out by Physical
headline.print_headline: Hall of Fame Iron Man Favre Almost Flunked Out by Physical

docs.snippet: Brett Favre, who will be inducted as a first ballot Hall of Famer at the Canton, Ohio shrine next month, set scores of NFL records during his 20-year career at quarterback, including a seemingly unbreakable Iron Man mark....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brett Favre, who will be inducted as a first ballot Hall of Famer at the Canton, Ohio shrine next month, set scores of NFL records during his 20-year career at quarterback, including a seemingly unbreakable Iron Man mark.

headline.main: Trump Chief Stars in Campaign Controversy
headline.print_headline: Trump Chief Stars in Campaign Controversy

docs.snippet: Even more than the candidate himself, Donald Trump's campaign chief has emerged as the early star of the Republican National Convention....
docs.lead_paragraph: Even more than the candidate himself, Donald Trump's campaign chief has emerged as the early star of the Republican National Convention.

headline.main: Man Sentenced After Victim IDs Old Classmate From Facebook
headline.print_headline: Man Sentenced After Victim IDs Old Classmate From Facebook

docs.snippet: A woman says she was able to identify the man who broke into her home and attacked her because he was a former middle school classmate she recognized from periodic appearances in her Facebook news feed....
docs.lead_paragraph: A woman says she was able to identify the man who broke into her home and attacked her because he was a former middle school classmate she recognized from periodic appearances in her Facebook news feed.

headline.main: For Those Who Love Him, Turkey's Erdogan Is the 'Tall Man'
headline.print_headline: For Those Who Love Him, Turkey's Erdogan Is the 'Tall Man'

docs.snippet: For those who love him, a mix of the religiously conservative and the rising middle class, Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan has been the powerhouse who drove economic success, gave Islam a greater role and boosted regional standing. Now, Uzu...
docs.lead_paragraph: For those who love him, a mix of the religiously conservative and the rising middle class, Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan has been the powerhouse who drove economic success, gave Islam a greater role and boosted regional standing. Now, Uzun Adam, or "Tall man" as he's nicknamed in Turkish, is also the hero who stared down tanks and fighter jets.

headline.main: Gulf Keystone Shares Spike and Plunge After Junk Bond Deal
headline.print_headline: Gulf Keystone Shares Spike and Plunge After Junk Bond Deal

docs.snippet: Gulf Keystone's stock spiked and fell by a third on Tuesday as retail investors flooded chatrooms trying to figure out how junk bond funds led by former JP Morgan and Lehman Brothers traders will help restructure the oil firm....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gulf Keystone's stock spiked and fell by a third on Tuesday as retail investors flooded chatrooms trying to figure out how junk bond funds led by former JP Morgan and Lehman Brothers traders will help restructure the oil firm.
